password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

loginScreen.title: Login to continue!
loginScreen.subTitle: Connect with friends, discover new communities, and share your life with orthers.Connect with friends, discover new communities, and share your life with orthers.

emailOrPhoneNumber.required: Email or Phone number cannot be empty
emailOrPhoneNumber.invalid: Email or Phone number is invalid

forgotPasswordScreen.textSub: Enter your email address or phone number. If an account exists, you’ll get an activation code.

changePwScreen.pwRule: The new password must be more than 6 characters, contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and special characters

error.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long

privacySettingScreen.title: Privacy Setting
privacySettingScreen.desc: Please review this info form your profile and decide who you’re comfortable with seeing it. Your profile may have more than is listed here.

educationDialog.title: What is your education?
educationDialog.desc: Please select your highest level of education to help us provide better recommendations and connect you with people of similar backgrounds.

usernameDialog.title: What is your name?
usernameDialog.desc: Enter your username. This will be visible to other users.

nicknameDialog.title: What is your nickname?
nicknameDialog.desc: Enter your nickname. This nickname will appear on your profile.

nationalityDialog.title: What is your nationality?
nationalityDialog.desc: Please select your nationality from the list below. This information will help us to tailor content and suggestions specifically for you.

locationDialog.title: Where do you live?
locationDialog.desc: Enter your location to easily connect friends around that area.

hometownDialog.title: What is your hometown?
hometownDialog.desc: Tell us where you were born or raised so we can help you connect with people from your hometown.

hobbyDialog.title: What are your hobbies?
hobbyDialog.desc: Tell me what your preferences relate to in order to get the right recommendations.

dateOfBirthDialog.title: What are your date of birth?
dateOfBirthDialog.desc: Select your date of birth so we can provide an experience that is age-appropriate for you. And you can determine your age and zodiac sign.

descDialog.title: Enter your description
descDialog.desc: Provide more descriptive information about you.
